ygData.subject: Restful Objects - A Hypermedia API For Domain Object Models
ygData.msgSnippet: REST architectures are becoming increasingly more common, both on the internet and within the enterprise. Behind most of these REST APIs is a domain model

Subject: Restful Objects - A Hypermedia API For Domain Object Models
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=473201793; y=SsvzedLpV8qQFwVRUaPWw7KajQ3Ed8D_Zjm9pFE7CvXW3i3BoIXLsw

REST architectures are becoming increasingly more common, both on the inter=
net and within the enterprise. Behind most of these REST APIs is a domain m=
odel (some anaemic, some less so); the wiring up of that REST API to the mo=
del involves lots of boilerplate and lots of testing.

http://skillsmatter.=
com/podcast/design-architecture/restful-objects

#REST #ROL #SOA
